title: Provides that downtown business revitalization zones be eligible for empire zone designation
summary: Provides that downtown business revitalization zones shall be eligible for empire zone designation.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         4126

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   February 1, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  ENGLEBRIGHT -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Economic Development

       AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to providing  for
         downtown  business revitalization zones to be eligible for empire zone
         designation

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section  958  of  the general municipal law is amended by
    2  adding a new subdivision (a-1) to read as follows:
    3    (A-1) NOTWITHSTANDING ANY OTHER PROVISION OF LAW,  LOCALLY  DESIGNATED
    4  DOWNTOWN  BUSINESS  REVITALIZATION  ZONES  CHARACTERIZED BY HIGH VACANCY
    5  RATES, VANDALISM AND DETERIORATED BUILDINGS AND INFRASTRUCTURE SHALL  BE
    6  DEEMED  TO  BE ELIGIBLE FOR EMPIRE ZONE DESIGNATION SUBJECT TO ANY REGU-
    7  LATIONS BY THE COMMISSIONER TO CONFORM SUCH INCLUSION WITH THE  PURPOSES
    8  OF THIS ARTICLE.
    9    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06079-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to providing for downtown business revitalization zones to be eligible for empire zone designation
